ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 82
ygData.msgSnippet: ... EXCEPT blacksmithing.  Oh well. ... somewhere near there.  I can make all items with only a few failures.  (I hate legs though, seem to fail a lot.) ...
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 2
> Date: Wed, 15 Sep 1999 13:46:28 -0700
> From: "lost One" <l0st1@...>
> Subject: Is blacksmithing broke?

>
> Everyone notice how last night all the other skills got some changes
EXCEPT blacksmithing. Oh well.
>
> Any how. I have a feeling blacksmithing is broke. My skill is 126 or
somewhere near there. I can make all items with only a few failures. (I
hate legs though, seem to fail a lot.)
> I have made well over 100 pieces of armor over the past couple of weeks,
and have not seen a single point of skill increase. I didn't have any
problem getting skill up to 126 making all the standard stuff, then I start
making armor, and I get nothing. My Int is about average 86. I'm thinking
that getting skill from making armor is broke. Has anyone else seen this?
Also, I know some armor items are trivial, and I know I'm not making a ton
of trivial armor items. I've made plenty of legs, mails, cloaks, mantles,
etc.

I've gotten skill from making armor several times. The thing that is hard
to notice about doing armor is it seems like you are doing a LOT of armor,
and not getting anything, but generally, now that I think about it, I'd do
hundreds of skewers at a time when I was raising my skill. Either way it
isn't just smithing that is broken this way. It took me 750 combines to get
5 fletching points this week. That's at 3pp per combine. These were
arrows, BTW. That's 3750 arrows, and supposedly the chances of getting a
skill up were doubled since they went to 5 arrows a try. Argh, that's a lot
of clicking.

-Wolfey

>
> Any insight you folks can provide would be great.
>
> Also, why aren't there banded gloves. I have people asking me for these
all the time. Let's get those /feedback /bugs going and get some changes to
blacksmithing in the works.
>
>
> Whaat!!! Have you tried The Doghouse??! Get your FREE WEB-BASED EMAIL
account at:
> http://doghousemail.lycos.com
